mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post(category_id, name, password, title, content) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{name}, #{password}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT category_id AS categoryId, category_name AS categoryName FROM category

SELECT post.post_id AS postId, category.category_name AS categoryName, post.name, post.title, post.view_count AS viewCount, DATE_FORMAT(post.create_date, '%Y%.%m%.%d% %h%:%i') AS createDate, DATE_FORMAT(post.update_date, '%Y%.%m%.%d% %h%:%i') AS updateDate, post.status, NULLIF((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM file file WHERE file.post_id = post.post_id), 0) AS fileCount FROM post post JOIN category category ON post.category_id = category.category_id
AND post.create_date >= #{startDate}
AND #{endDate} >= post.create_date
AND post.category_id = #{categoryId}
AND CONCAT(post.title, post.name, post.content) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND post.status = 1
ORDER BY post.post_id DESC

SELECT post.post_id AS postId, category.category_name AS categoryName, post.name, post.password, post.title, post.content, post.view_count AS viewCount, DATE_FORMAT(post.create_date, '%Y%.%m%.%d% %h%:%i') AS createDate, DATE_FORMAT(post.update_date, '%Y%.%m%.%d% %h%:%i') AS updateDate, post.status FROM post post JOIN category category ON post.category_id = category.category_id WHERE post.post_id = #{postId}
SELECT comment.content, DATE_FORMAT(comment.create_date, '%Y%.%m%.%d% %h%:%i') AS createDate FROM comment comment WHERE comment.post_id = #{postId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file(post_id, file_original_name, file_name, file_path, file_size) VALUES (#{postId}, #{fileOriginalName}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize})
mapper.select: SELECT file.file_id AS fileId, file.post_id AS postId, file.file_original_name AS fileOriginalName, file.file_name AS fileName, file.file_path AS filePath, file.file_size AS fileSize FROM file file WHERE file.post_id = ${postId}
SELECT file.post_id AS postId, file.file_original_name AS fileOriginalName, file.file_name AS fileName, file.file_path AS filePath FROM file file WHERE file.file_id = ${fileId}
